channel.title: OptiX || 718/742 || Packed with content || Need mods
channel.description:
[center]
[img]http://proximitygaming.co.uk/images/nova/logo.png[/img] Website: [url=http://proximitygaming.co.uk]OptiX Website[/url] Client: [url=http://"http://proximitygaming.co.uk/optix.jar"]http://proximitygaming.co.uk/optix.jar[/url]
Features: -718/742(Pre-EoC)~ -Fully working PvP system~ -PvpPoints From pking -Weekly updates~ -Unique home~ -3 Different Donor Ranks -Always Online + No Lag~ -Fullscreen client + Webclient~ -Clan Wars pvp! Safe + Risk~ -Two Multi pk zones! Safe + Risk~ -Full Summoning with scrolls & Pets~ -Squeal of fortune & daily spins~ -Double xp on weekends~ -All 24 skills working~ -Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless -Fast Switching -Full Summoning!! -Armour set effects all added! -Degrading Pvp Armours -Storm Of Armadyl Spell -Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar) -All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! -Quick Chat 100% -Donorzones - All new 742 armours with bonuses -All Auras with little to no cooldowns~ -Better & Fast Boss Drops~ -Loyalty Points + Rewards Shop~ -Title System~ -Large Community + Active Staff~ -Daily & Weekly Events + Prizes~ -Website Highscores~ -Voting Rewards~
Bosses: -Fully Scripted Nex and Nomad with cut-scenes -All Godwars Bosses -King Black Dragon + Queen Black Dragon -Corporal Beast -Tormented Demons
Minigames: -Fully scripted Fight Caves (All 63 waves) -Fully scripted Fight Kiln (36 waves) -Full Dominion Tower + DT Rewards -Troll invasion
Server Specs Bandwidth 4000GB/2TB 4 gigs of ddr2 Windows 7 Server 8.10 w/ xfc GUI 40 gig diskspace Dedicated server

item.title: OptiX || 718/742 || Packed with content || Need mods
item.dc:creator: @pinkterrorist pinkterrorist
item.description:
@pinkterrorist wrote:

[center]


Website: OptiX Website
Client: http://proximitygaming.co.uk/optix.jar

Features:
-718/742(Pre-EoC)~
-Fully working PvP system~
-PvpPoints From pking
-Weekly updates~
-Unique home~
-3 Different Donor Ranks
-Always Online + No Lag~
-Fullscreen client + Webclient~
-Clan Wars pvp! Safe + Risk~
-Two Multi pk zones! Safe + Risk~
-Full Summoning with scrolls & Pets~
-Squeal of fortune & daily spins~
-Double xp on weekends~
-All 24 skills working~
-Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless
-Fast Switching
-Full Summoning!!
-Armour set effects all added!
-Degrading Pvp Armours
-Storm Of Armadyl Spell
-Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
-All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons!
-Quick Chat 100%
-Donorzones

  • All new 742 armours with bonuses
    -All Auras with little to no cooldowns~
    -Better & Fast Boss Drops~
    -Loyalty Points + Rewards Shop~
    -Title System~
    -Large Community + Active Staff~
    -Daily & Weekly Events + Prizes~
    -Website Highscores~
    -Voting Rewards~

Bosses:
-Fully Scripted Nex and Nomad with cut-scenes
-All Godwars Bosses
-King Black Dragon + Queen Black Dragon
-Corporal Beast
-Tormented Demons

Minigames:
-Fully scripted Fight Caves (All 63 waves)
-Fully scripted Fight Kiln (36 waves)
-Full Dominion Tower + DT Rewards
-Troll invasion

Server Specs
Bandwidth 4000GB/2TB
4 gigs of ddr2
Windows 7 Server 8.10 w/ xfc GUI
40 gig diskspace
Dedicated server
